title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When using the report design in BIRT, I observed that the include for a library file stores an absolute path. However, it should be saving the relative path of the library file instead. Currently, the absolute path is being saved as:<propertyname="fileName"/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property<property name="namespace"lib1</property>
OB: The report design is storing the absolute path of the library file instead of the relative path.
EB: The report design should store the relative path of the library file.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open BIRT and create a report design.
2. Include a library file using an absolute path.
3. Save the report design and observe the file path being saved.
